objects.text:
• Ultrasonic Mist Humidifier
• 8Hr Water Tank Capacity
• Remote Operation
• High Airflow & Low Noise

product_details.name: KUHL Exzel H2 400mm Desert Cooler with Ultrasonic Mist Humidifier | 75 W | Remote Operation | No Water Droplets | 8Hr Water Tank Capacity | High Air Flow & Low Noise Function |Free Installation

banner_details:
This promotional banner is designed with a clean, modern layout divided into four quadrants using soft, cool-toned blue backgrounds. The top left quadrant introduces the product with a bold brand name (`brand_name`) in dark blue, followed by a futuristic product title (`heading`) and a subheading (`subheading`) indicating the product type. The lower-left features a bulleted list of product features (`description`) presented in a clear, readable sans-serif font. Below that, the price (`price`) is prominently highlighted, paired with a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg`) containing a white "BUY NOW" label (`cta`). The right half of the banner displays a vertically positioned product image (`product_image`). Faint decorative curves and circular overlays add a dynamic and harmonious flow across the layout without crowding the elements.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blue: `#EBF5FA`
- Sky Blue: `#DCEDF5`
- Cool Cyan: `#CDE5F0`
- Soft Blue: `#B7DBE9`
- Navy Blue: `#1A5F8C`
- Medium Blue: `#3A7CA8`
- Accent Light Blue: `#4A90C0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern fan design with a dominant black base and body, accentuated by subtle metallic and translucent dark gray tones. The central fan blades are encased in a fine black mesh that adds a sense of precision and sophistication. The display panel includes minimal white and red highlights for controls, and the "Kühl" brand label pops with a bright turquoise blue (Hex: #00B9D8) and white (Hex: #FFFFFF), instantly catching attention. Primary colors for the ad banner could include deep black (Hex: #000000), dark gray (Hex: #2E2E2E), turquoise (Hex: #00B9D8), and white (Hex: #FFFFFF). These colors blend smoothly, enhancing the product’s modern look while strategically using color contrast to highlight functionality and branding.
